sentence: The interior line contains two draft picks - center Brian Allen and left guard David Edwards - along with right guard Austin Corbett, a trade acquisition from Cleveland in 2019.

title: Bold, brash Rams pair flashy superstars with rock-solid core

sentence: “He’s taught me how to be a pro whether that’s on the field or off the field.” While Edwards has one more year left on his four-year, $2.8 million rookie deal, fellow starters, right guard Austin Corbett and center Brian Allen, will be unrestricted free agents.
author: Jeff Fedotin
title: The Los Angeles Rams’ Oldest Player, Andrew Whitworth, Faces Former Bengals Team

sentence: Full-time or frequent starters who could become unrestricted free agents on March 16 include wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr., outside linebacker Von Miller, running back Sony Michel, right guard Austin Corbett, center Brian Allen, nose tackle Sebastian Joseph-Day and cornerback Darious Williams.

title: Rams face these 10 offseason issues as they seek Super Bowl repeat

sentence: They moved to prevent a mass exodus from the offensive line by re-signing starting center Brian Allen as well as new left tackle Joe Noteboom and guard/center Coleman Shelton.

sentence: The team did resign some key free agents along the offensive line including starting center Brian Allen.
